name: The Maze..?
description:
This game, The_Maze was made by BuildHatStudios using the Unreal Game Engine.

Please note that the game is really slow on really bad pcs, (2 frames per second), with decent computers but not the best a bit faster and ok (15-fps), and the best computers run it extremely fast. I'm not sure how many frames, as I don't have one myself, but I guess around 100 or more fps. this game was made with default materials and also the default player character, and the materials overlap in some areas (meaning the materials will
glitch and flash - maybe lights will flash too, I dont know), so try not to
look at them if you feel the need to.

This game is for everybody to play that uses this computer.

Have fun.

-BuildHatStudios 

This is a boring and also free game made with unreal engine as an experiment as to what i may create in the future.
